## ICallControl.ring() method

Starts or ends the "ring" effect on the Jabra device. Used to indicate an incoming call.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ring(shouldRing: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  shouldRing | boolean | <code>true</code> to start the "ring" effect, <code>false</code> to stop it. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Exceptions

If a call lock was not acquired prior to execution. See [ICallControl.takeCallLock()](./jabra-js.icallcontrol.takecalllock.md) for more details.
